title: Vegetable Rice Pilaf in the Rice Cooker

Ingredients.4: 4 small heads baby bok choy, trimmed and chopped

Ingredients.9: 0.25 cup water, or more if needed

Directions.1: Dissolve 3 teaspoons chicken bouillon in 3 1/2 cups water in a rice cooker.

Directions.2: Stir rice, baby bok choy, green onions, carrot, and mushrooms into the bouillon and water mixture.

Directions.3: Start rice cooker and cook until liquid is absorbed and rice is tender, about 50 minutes.

Directions.4: Dissolve 1 teaspoon chicken bouillon and 1/4 cup water in a small bowl; transfer mixture to a blender.

Directions.5: Scoop about 1 cup of the rice mixture into the blender with the bouillon mixture; process until mixture becomes a thin paste, adding more water as needed.

Directions.6: Mix the rice paste with the remaining cooked vegetables and rice until thoroughly combined.
